name: Run Jump Die
description:
"...kind of quirky and out of the blue ...single-thumb platformer 'Run Jump Die'."
- Jared Nelson, Touch Arcade

"Get out the rye bread and the mustard, Grandma! Reminds me of the coin-op days of my childhood, and it actually responds to input flawlessly, I'm hooked. This is a great game."
- tarrk

Imagine playing a platformer on a mobile device with just your thumb. Turn when you want, jump when you want, climb ladders, defeat enemies, enter doors, collect items. You're in control!

Simple Controls
1. Long Press to Jump
2. Long Press Longer to Jump Higher
3. Quick Tap for Everything Else

Wonderful one thumb play
Amazing 8-bit graphics and sound
Keep a snap shot of each "Fail" as a memento (turn on in App Settings)
Great replay-ability, with 6 objectives in each level (something for everyone)
28 exciting levels
Endless lives

"I'm enjoying the game quite a bit, it's easy to learn but hard to master.” - Emotive

"Loving it so far.... The fact that it's a 1 button platformer is brilliant....” - DJfelix

"...kind of quirky and out of the blue ...single-thumb platformer 'Run Jump Die'." - Jared Nelson, Touch Arcade
